name: The War of Genesis: Remnants of Gray
summary: The War of Genesis: Remnants of Gray is a remake of the first and second games in the War of Genesis series and will use the Unreal Engine 4. The game is currently scheduled to release in South Korea, with no word on an international release.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: 창세기전 : 회색의 잔영 (The War of Genesis : Remnants of Gray) First Playable Teaser
